channel.title: Starting over
channel.description:
Hello there,
I've got a quite simple question here...
I've been having my own server for a while now. But im not completely satisfied of its capibility. I used test/cheez-scape but the problem is that it has many bugs and other wierd issues.
Now I really want to start a new server, with a somewhat better base code. Can anyone reccomend me a java server (like devolution, cheezscape, ricscape etc.) that I can use to develop my new server? I have some java experience so far so a source that has tricky coding shouldnt be a problem.
Thanks!

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

k imma check devolution out then. Thanks alot ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Also, if you want to make a basic client to go with the Devolution v7 source, try Kihomura’s client

Read full topic

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Yeah i tried finding my source, i can’t find it :
Sorry! But try doing what chassy said.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You will NEVER find a server without bugs in it. If you are going to create an okay server but aren’t looking for super stability, try Allstar, or Devolution v7.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @swodlayer swodlayer
item.description:
@swodlayer wrote:

k thanks alot so far =)

Read full topic

item.title: Starting over
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

Well 317’s for one are very buggy…
I did have an old one (Errorscape) But it was Semi - buggy,
There were some things in there that would annoy me, but had pretty good base codes. I’ll see if i can find it, if i can I’ll upload it and see if you like it.

Read full topic
